content: You're too good to feel this bad about yourself. I know that, and you should know that. You have true courage and a big heart. I've seen you get knocked down so many times before, and every single time, you get up again. That's real strength. And... and you're ten times funnier than any human I know. See? See, you know you're amazing. You're smart, and fast, and beautiful. Rayla, you're the most amazing person I've ever met.
author: Aaron Ehasz and Justin Richmond
